ARABIC: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Without question they will be the greatest losers in the Next World.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Undoubtedly they will be losers in the life to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Doubtlessly, they shall be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In the life to come they will certainly lose a great deal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They will be, unnecessarily, the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Certainly, they are those who will be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Truly in the hereafter they are the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: they without doubt will be the greatest losers in the world to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Assuredly in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In the Hereafter, it is they who shall be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Undoubtedly they! in the Hereafter they shall be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Undoubtedly, they are the ones who will be the biggest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Without a doubt, these are the very ones who will lose most in the Hereafter!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Certainly, they are those who will be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: without doubt they will be the greatest losers in the Everlasting Life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Without a doubt, in the Hereafter, they will be the biggest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Assuredly, it is they in the Hereafter who will be the greatest losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:22] Without doubt, verily, they will be the greatest losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Assuredly in the Hereafter they will be the greatest losers) of Paradise and that which is in it.
